means: a multiprogramming language extension 多道程序设计语言扩充

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"充分的，丰富的"之意。
means: abundant ：着重某物极为丰富有或大量的供应。
plentiful ：普通用词，指某物的数量多得称心如意，不过剩，但较少用于描写抽象之物。
ample ：指某物不仅满足了需要而且有余。

sentence.Network_en: The equivalent of two tablespoons of polyunsaturated oils is ample each day.
sentence.Network_cn: 每天相当于两大汤匙多重不饱和油的量就足够了。

sentence.Network_en: There'll be ample opportunity to relax, swim and soak up some sun.
sentence.Network_cn: 将会有充足的机会去放松、游泳和晒太阳。

sentence.Network_en: Cook pieces of succulent chicken with ample garlic and a little sherry.
sentence.Network_cn: 烹饪鲜美滑嫩的鸡肉时多加些大蒜，并滴入少许雪利酒。

英语六级词汇(新大纲) ... amends/ E5mendz/n. 赔偿 ample/ 5Ampl/a. 足够的；宽敞的 amplify/ 5Amplifai/vt. 放大，增强；扩大.
英语六级词汇(新大纲) ... amends/ E5mendz/n. 赔偿 ample/ 5Ampl/a. 足够的；宽敞的 amplify/ 5Amplifai/vt. 放大，增强；扩大.
3500高考英语单词_百度文库 ... amount 数量总计，数量 ample 充足的，丰富的 amuse （使人）快乐，逗乐 ▲.

list.abs: its economy is still in the early stages of development , with ample room to play catch-up with rich countries by adding its capital stock and lifting productivity .中国经济依然处于发展的初级阶段，通过资本积累和提高生产率，有足够的空间来赶上富裕国家。
近义词比较_百度文库 ... (longitude 经度) (ample time 充裕的时间; (take/feel alarm at… 因…而惊恐).
...丰富除子编辑丰富除子(ample divisor)是代数曲面中最重要的一类除子。所谓除子.
航海及海运专业英语词汇(A4) ... amphoteric electrolyte 两性电解质 ample evidence 充分证据 ample 充分的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : via French from Latin amplus 'large, capacious, abundant'

entry.def: If there is an ample amount of something, there is enough of it and usually some extra.

example.ex: There'll be ample opportunity to relax, swim and soak up some sun...
example.tran: 将会有充足的机会去放松、游泳和晒太阳。

example.ex: The design of the ground floor created ample space for a good-sized kitchen.
example.tran: 底层的设计为建一个大厨房提供了充足的空间。

entry.def: If you describe someone's figure as ample, you mean that they are large in a pleasant or attractive way.

example.ex: ...a young mother with a baby resting against her ample bosom.
example.tran: 丰满的怀里抱着婴儿的年轻妈妈

means.word_mean: 1. more than enough in size or scope or capacity;

auth_sentence.content: There is ample information about projects and goals here.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is ample information about projects and goals here.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is ample information about projects and goals here.

auth_sentence.content: Where they come from, Syrians have ample water.
auth_sentence.res_content: Where they come from, Syrians have ample water.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Where they come from, Syrians have ample water.

auth_sentence.content: The site has ample catering, of variable quality.
auth_sentence.res_content: The site has ample catering, of variable quality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The site has ample catering, of variable quality.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =take/procure,表示"拿,获得,拿走后[变空]"; 2. =large,表示"大"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 充分的,富裕的;宽敞的,宽大的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ampl大+e→adj.充分的,富裕的;宽敞的,宽大的
ex出+ample=ampl拿,获得,拿走后[变空]→拿出作为榜样

stems_affixes.value_cn: 模范, 榜样, 标本
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+empl=ampl拿,获得,拿走后[变空]+ar物→拿出作为榜样

stems_affixes.value_cn: 样品,实例,标本,抽样检查
stems_affixes.word_buile: s=se+ample=ampl拿,获得,拿走后[变空]→分开拿出→标本
ampl大+itude表名词→n.广大;充足;振幅

stems_affixes.value_cn: 举例证明;示范;作……的范例[榜样]
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+empl=ampl拿,获得,拿走后[变空]+ify表动词→拿出作为榜样
s=se+ample=ampl拿,获得,拿走后[变空]→分开拿出→标本

stems_affixes.value_cn: 放大,增强;详述,详加解说

Sentence.sentence: They have ample opportunities to meet the opposite sex.

sentences.en: The sun was setting fast, but there was still ample light.
sentences.cn: 夕阳西下, 天色很快暗下来, 但是还有足够的光线。

sentences.en: Thirty dollars will be ample for the purpose.

means.word_mean: 大量的, 丰富的,丰满的；硕大的

sentences.en: The election was given ample coverage on TV.
sentences.cn: 电视上对选举作了广泛的报道。

jushi.english: There is ample room for eight desks here.
jushi.chinese: 这儿有足够的空间摆下八张书桌。

jushi.english: The sun was setting fast, but there was still ample light.
jushi.chinese: 夕阳西下,天色很快暗下来,但是还有足够的光线。

jushi.english: We have ample time for a leisurely lunch.
jushi.chinese: 我们有足够的时间从容吃午饭。
